channel.title: Start client in high detail?
channel.description: Hey I was wondering how do I start the client in high detail instead of low detail thanks.

item.title: Start client in high detail?
item.dc:creator: @Realm_of_Dark Realm of Dark
item.description:
@Realm_of_Dark wrote:

well to use high detail (such as the new HD), you must download a HD client (they can be found in the Server Downloads section).

they are specifically HD because they use different models than low definition, thus requiring a completely different client to run.

unless I am mistaken, that is what you must do. good luck =]

Read full topic
